column4: any way to actually install windows from linux on a real partition?
pleeease lol
what I did a few days ago was to install linux on virtualbox inside another linux instance, then i used clonezilla to back it up amd then restore it to real drive
i am sure you could do the same, but you have to ensure that hardware matches
